languages.text: Орудие уничтожает любую угрозу, но в отсутствие врагов утоляет жажду крови, охотясь на жителей колонии.
The Engine destroys any threat it detects, but in the absence of enemies, it satisfies its thirst for blood by hunting the colony's inhabitants.
languages.original_text: Орудие уничтожает любую угрозу, но в отсутствие врагов утоляет жажду крови, охотясь на жителей колонии.

traits.locale_text: The Engine destroys any threat it detects, but in the absence of enemies, it satisfies its thirst for blood by hunting the colony's inhabitants.
Soon, the wandering monster becomes a living legend, fuelling fear of the Rogue Trader.

The Engine destroys any threat it detects, but in the absence of enemies, it satisfies its thirst for blood by hunting the colony's inhabitants.

languages.text: Si la Machine élimine systématiquement toutes les menaces qu'elle détecte, en l'absence d'ennemis, elle étanche sa soif de sang en pourchassant les habitants de la colonie.
languages.original_text: The Engine destroys any threat it detects, but in the absence of enemies, it satisfies its thirst for blood by hunting the colony's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: Si la Machine élimine systématiquement toutes les menaces qu'elle détecte, en l'absence d'ennemis, elle étanche sa soif de sang en pourchassant les habitants de la colonie.

languages.text: エンジンは、発見したいかなる脅威も破壊するが、敵がいない場合はコロニーの住民を狩ることで血への渇きを満たす。
languages.original_text: The Engine destroys any threat it detects, but in the absence of enemies, it satisfies its thirst for blood by hunting the colony's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: エンジンは、発見したいかなる脅威も破壊するが、敵がいない場合はコロニーの住民を狩ることで血への渇きを満たす。

languages.text: 这台引擎会消灭它探测到的一切威胁。不过，如果找不到敌人，它会转而狩猎殖民地的居民，满足对鲜血的渴望。
languages.original_text: The Engine destroys any threat it detects, but in the absence of enemies, it satisfies its thirst for blood by hunting the colony's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: 这台引擎会消灭它探测到的一切威胁。不过，如果找不到敌人，它会转而狩猎殖民地的居民，满足对鲜血的渴望。

languages.text: El motor destruye cualquier amenaza que detecta, pero en ausencia de peligro sacia su sed de sangre cazando a los habitantes de la colonia.
languages.original_text: The Engine destroys any threat it detects, but in the absence of enemies, it satisfies its thirst for blood by hunting the colony's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: El motor destruye cualquier amenaza que detecta, pero en ausencia de peligro sacia su sed de sangre cazando a los habitantes de la colonia.

languages.text: Die Maschine zerstört jede Bedrohung, die sie erkennt. Da sich jedoch keine Feinde in der Nähe befinden, stillt sie ihren Blutdurst, indem sie die Bewohner der Kolonie jagt.
languages.original_text: The Engine destroys any threat it detects, but in the absence of enemies, it satisfies its thirst for blood by hunting the colony's inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: Die Maschine zerstört jede Bedrohung, die sie erkennt. Da sich jedoch keine Feinde in der Nähe befinden, stillt sie ihren Blutdurst, indem sie die Bewohner der Kolonie jagt.

languages.text: Motor, saptadığı her türlü tehdidi yok ediyor ancak düşmanların yokluğunda kan arzusunu koloni sakinlerini avlayarak tatmin ediyor.
languages.original_text: The Engine destroys any threat it detects, but in the absence of enemies, it satisfies its thirst for blood by hunting the colony's inhabitants.
